Term.Name: Translation
Term.Definition: Translation of just the dialogue in a language other than the audio track dialogue.

Term.Name: Hard of hearing
Term.Definition: Subtitles produced for the deaf and hard of hearing people

Term.Name: Audio description
Term.Definition: Subtitles that include the description of the visual scene and intended to be used by the receiver to render audio description (e.g. with text-to-speech technology.

Term.Name: Content related commentary
Term.Definition: Subtitles that include content-related commentary (e.g. directors commentary).

Term.Name: Forced Narrative
Term.Definition: Subtitles used to clarify dialogue, burned-in text, and other information that is not explained or easily understood by the viewer.
